--- revoke_role.sql
REVOKE ROLE pii_access, pii_writter FROM ROLE hr_manager, hr_director

--- AST
&ast.Revoke{
  Privilege: &ast.RolePrivilege{
    Role: 7,
    Names: []*ast.Ident{
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 12,
        NameEnd: 22,
        Name: "pii_access",
      },
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 24,
        NameEnd: 35,
        Name: "pii_writter",
      },
    },
  },
  Roles: []*ast.Ident{
    &ast.Ident{
      NamePos: 46,
      NameEnd: 56,
      Name: "hr_manager",
    },
    &ast.Ident{
      NamePos: 58,
      NameEnd: 69,
      Name: "hr_director",
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
REVOKE ROLE pii_access, pii_writter FROM ROLE hr_manager, hr_director
